attributes.review: I was so excited to support Mr orange by downloading this app. This is one of the worse apps ever because it took several hours to download this crap and once I got into the app my phone started to over heat and my phone crashed. Now whenever I log into my phone it starts to crash every minute which made it so difficult to talk with my employees in my business. My stocks have going down and now my life is ruined. Thanks to this app!
